projects: [{"title":"Automatic Billing using YOLO and CNN | Guide: Prof. S.K.Barai, IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Feb 2017","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"• Developed a Deep CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) to compute the final price of sweets.• Employed YOLO (You Look Only Once) based loss function to localize for the objects in the image.• Used a pre-trained VGG network on ImageNet and applied transfer learning for the task of object localization.• Designed a web portal to take the photograph of a collection of items as input and produce the total price for the items."}]
